run.script:
source .env
# node --inspect-wait ./packages/msar/dist/bin/msar.js ...
msar snapshot --stdoutLevel all --logFilePath ./var/snapshot.log --logRequests -u "$(op item get $OP_ITEM --fields username)" -p "$(op item get $OP_ITEM --fields password --reveal)" --sso $SSO --outputPath "$OUT" --all --association "Classes" --pretty  "$URL"
